short_desc: A semi-automatic, stainless garri fryer for hygienic and uniform toasting of processed cassava mash.
why_sells: Popular among small garri producers for its efficiency, consistent output, and cleaner operation compared to manual frying.
mockup_prompt: Minimal stainless garri fryer with visible heating drum, digital control panel, and blank branding panel at front.
seo_title: Semi-Automatic Cassava Garri Fryer for Small Businesses in Nigeria
seo_description: Boost garri production with this hygienic, semi-auto stainless fryer. Fast, efficient, and trusted by Nigerian food entrepreneurs.
business_summary: Ideal for small and medium cassava processors aiming to scale garri output while meeting food safety standards. Low labor, quick ROI.
market_notes: High demand in Southern Nigeria and emerging in urban centers due to rising garri consumption and SME investments.
sourcing_notes: Standardized models available; ensure NAFDAC-compliant material and aftersales support.

machine_name: Mini Rice Destoner and Polisher Combo
short_desc: Compact rice destoner and polisher unit removes stones and enhances rice shine in one pass.
why_sells: Favored by community mills and local aggregators for its all-in-one design, space efficiency, and quality finish.
mockup_prompt: Neat, compact rice processing machine with dual hoppers, clear separation chambers, and front panel for branding.
seo_title: Compact Rice Destoner & Polisher for Nigerian Rice Mills
seo_description: Efficiently clean and polish rice with this mini combo unit, perfect for local processors seeking premium output.
business_summary: Enables local rice processors to deliver clean, market-ready rice, reducing post-harvest losses and improving sales value.
market_notes: Small-scale rice millers across North and Middle Belt Nigeria prioritize this for market competitiveness.
sourcing_notes: Widely sourced from Asia; check for spares and voltage compatibility. For industrial lines, chat with LineScout team.
